plot: Mi-ryeong believes men to be the enemy of women--practically a different species. But she cannot help falling in love with Dong-won when they meet at the beach
title: Yeoseongui jeok
plot_es: Mi-ryeong believes men to be the enemy of women--practically a different species. But she cannot help falling in love with Dong-won when they meet at the beach
plot_en: Mi-ryeong believes men to be the enemy of women--practically a different species. But she cannot help falling in love with Dong-won when they meet at the beach
